articles.title: Oscar Tshiebwe to Earn About $2 Million in NIL, Per Report - Sports Illustrated
articles.description: He’s the first National Player of the Year to return to school since 2008.
articles.content:
Kentucky big man Oscar Tshiebwe announced Wednesday that he would be returning to Lexington for his senior season and he will reportedly cash in on a major payday.
